paint.shared.objects

Class Project

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.shared.objects.Project

  • public class Project
extends Object
    Represents a PAINT project that contains experiments, configuration objects, and references to relevant directories.

    This class manages metadata and provides accessor methods for project-level configuration and experiment data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Project()
      Constructs an empty Project instance.
      Project(boolean status, Path projectRootPath, Path imagesRootPath, List<String> experimentNames, PaintConfig paintConfig, GenerateSquaresConfig generateSquaresConfig, TrackMateConfig trackMateConfig, List<Experiment> experiments)
      Constructs a fully-specified Project instance.
      Project(Path projectRootPath)
      Constructs a Project with a root path and an empty experiment list.
      Project(Path projectRootPath, List<Experiment> experiments)
      Constructs a Project using only a root path and experiments list.

      • Project

        public Project(boolean status,
               Path projectRootPath,
               Path imagesRootPath,
               List<String> experimentNames,
               PaintConfig paintConfig,
               GenerateSquaresConfig generateSquaresConfig,
               TrackMateConfig trackMateConfig,
               List<Experiment> experiments)
        Constructs a fully-specified Project instance.
        Parameters:
        status - the project status
        projectRootPath - the root directory of the project
        imagesRootPath - the images directory path
        experimentNames - list of experiment names
        paintConfig - PAINT configuration instance
        generateSquaresConfig - GenerateSquares configuration instance
        trackMateConfig - TrackMate configuration instance
        experiments - list of experiment objects
